about_the_game:
Come Home is a free game and will always be a free game, but this Premium Edition contains loads of extra content, receives updates before the free version, and is a great way to show your support for the game and its developer. The game is still in early access and is not finished. This is not a finished version of the game. It will be regularly updated in the future and more content will be added to the Premium Version as development continues.

Extra Content

  • Bonus scenes

  • Clothing options for dates - All characters have multiple clothing options on dates, with more bonus clothing options coming for characters every update.

  • Additional Sex Positions / Options - The premium version contains exclusive sex options/positions.

  • Additional Date Locations - Every character will get one Premium Version exclusive location.

  • Bonus Image Gallery - An expanding gallery of images formerly only available to patrons.

Early Updates

The premium version will be updated at least two weeks before the free version. This will remain true for the rest of the development of the game.

Current Premium Exclusive Content

  • 9 new bonus scenes - A touching scene with Connie the Waitress, a one-night-stand with a local soccer mom, a throuple date with Kendra and Adrian, along with 3 different after-date possibilities, a fantasy scene with Adrian in Souls of War, a threesome with the Gertrude and Mi-Cha, a threesome with Lisa and Jez, a threesome with Izzy and her boss, a threesome with Brandi and one of her supporters, and a second threesome with Mari and Reba (in costume).

  • 46 Bonus Clothing options for dates - Jamie (4), Adrian (4), Mari (4), Juliana (4), Whitney (4), Reba (3), Brandi (3), Kendra (3), Tammy (2), Bai (2), Izzy (3), Jez (2), Mi-Cha (3), Dana (2), Suzy (1), Ms. Welch (1), Lisa (1)

  • Additional Sex Positions / Options - Suzy pigtail sex options

  • Additional Date Locations - Mari dogwalking date at the park, Juliana Beach date, Mari beach date, Lisa cafe date.

  • Bonus Image Gallery - 80 bonus images

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of sexual acts. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are adults.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible

name: Come Home - Premium Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
